name: Chia Chipotle Dressing From 'Salad Samurai'
description: In this dressing, from Terry Hope Romero's Salad Samurai, the chipotle's heat is kept in check by sweet orange juice and agave nectar, and lime juice and cumin add spunk. The chia seeds give it body (without making it slimy, don't worry). It works brilliantly with the luscious grilled fruit in the Fiery Fruit and Quinoa Salad.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup freshly squeezed or store-bought orange juice
1 tablespoon chopped chipotle chiles in adobo sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together all of the ingredients in a glass or plastic measuring cup. Cover and chill for 10 minutes or overnight to plump up the chia seeds. Store chilled and use within 2 days for best flavor.
